Name: Arkenlich

Actions.Name: Lesser Unholy
Actions.Effects: Attack target is vulnerable. This action can also be made as a close blast 1 melee attack.

Actions.Name: Puppet Strings
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is shoved 3 in a direction of the Lich's choice.

Actions.Name: Finger of Death
Actions.Effects: This attack can't lower a character past 1 hp.

Actions.Name: Paralyze with Fear
Actions.Description: The Lich releases a horrible shriek, a close blast 1 area effect. One character in the area must save or become immobile until the end of their next turn. Effect: Any non-relict character in the area takes [fray] damage three times at the end of their turn, then this effect ends. They can ignore this effect by ending their turn adjacent to an ally.

Actions.Name: Vile
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is vulnerable, and must save or take take 1 piercing damage for each space they move until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Master of Death
Actions.Description: Summon 5 husks in free spaces in range 4.

PhasesDescription: The lich progress through its three phases in order (I>III, then back to I), starting with phase I, then swapping to the next phase each round.

Actions.Name: Entombment of Iz
Actions.Description: The Lich entombs a character in a magical sarcophagus, summoning it in their space.

Summons.Name: Sarcophagus of Iz
Summons.SummonEffects: Shares space with a character. While inside, they take 3 piercing damage at the start of their turns and are immobile, but can otherwise be targeted normally. The Sarcophagus has resistance against the character inside it.
